name: Bodega Glass 12 Oz
description: Made in Spain, Bodega glasses have a classic, clean design for every day sipping as well as gracious entertaining.
description_long: Made in Spain, Bodega glasses have a classic, clean design for every day sipping as well as gracious entertaining. The medium-sized glass is a great choice for serving wine or mixed drinks. Offered in a set of 12, the glasses are made of tempered glass, making them more durable than regular glass.

name: Egyptian Cotton Bath Towels
description: Luxurious Egyptian combed cotton, prized for the extra long fibers that enhance both absorbency and durability, is woven in plush terry toweling.
description_long: These Egyptian cotton towels are certified by Oeko-Tex®, an international association focused on textile safety and sustainable production. Oeko-Tex® tests for known harmful substances and chemicals as well as for acidity and color fastness. All components of the product must comply with stringent Oeko-Tex® standards to achieve certification.

name: Cas Nightstand
description: Cas plays modern with rustic wood, framing the rich color and defined grain of natural oak veneer in dark grey high-gloss lacquer.
description_long: Cas plays modern with rustic wood, framing the rich color and defined grain of natural oak veneer in dark grey high-gloss lacquer. Tinted warm brown with hints of grey, planks of veneer arrange the nightstand's four drawers in seamless asymmetry.

name: Brim 19 Bar Espresso Machine
description: Become your own barista with this gleaming silver espresso machine.
description_long: Constructed with a high-pressure Italian pump, the machine also offers low-pressure pre-infusion for precisely balanced flavor extraction. The unique Dry Steam process tops every espresso shot with rich crema, while the commercial-style, 360° swivel steaming wand froths milk into a dreamily texturized microfoam.

name: Curran Quilted Chocolate Counter Stool
description: Sleek Italian design cradles comfort with a gracefully curved back that hugs the body.
description_long: Sleek Italian design cradles comfort with a gracefully curved back that hugs the body. Upholstered in synthetic leather quilted with a handsome diamond stitch, the counter stool offers the look and feel of the real thing, with the added bonus of easy care and exceptional durability.

name: Eisen Obsidian Throw Blanket
description: Ultra-soft yarns weave an open windowpane plaid in bold black and white.
description_long: The delightfully fuzzy brushed finish and extra-long fringe complement the crisp, linear design, which reverses to the opposite pattern on the blanket's reverse side. Perfect for black-and-white decor, the Eisen obsidian throw blanket layers modern geometry and irresistible coziness on a sofa, armchair or bed.
